message.name: ERR_WRONG_USER
message.locale: Cannot submit an application or screening with this user name.

message.name: ERR_UNAUTHORISED_ACCESS
message.locale: You are not authorised to access this resource.

message.name: ERR_WRONG_USER_TYPE
message.locale: You cannot log into Citizen Self Service with this username.

message.name: ERR_TRIAGE_SCRIPT_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An IEG Script for Triage has not been defined

message.name: ERR_TRIAGE_SCHEMA_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: A Datastore Schema for Triage has not been defined.

message.name: INF_CHUNK_DETAILS
message.locale: Summary for chunk id = %1n:\nNumber of processed record(s): %2n \nNumber of skipped record(s): %3n

message.name: INF_RECORDS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Record(s) processed: %1n

message.name: INF_RECORDS_SKIPPED
message.locale: Total number of Record(s) skipped: %1n

message.name: ERR_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, records for up to %2n generated users will not have been processed.

message.name: ERR_NON_REFERENCED_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, records for up to %2n non referenced records are not processed.

message.name: ERR_OLD_DATA_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, records for up to %2n old records are not processed.

message.name: INF_JOB_START_TIME
message.locale: This batch job started at %1s

message.name: INF_JOB_END_TIME
message.locale: This batch job completed at %1s

message.name: WARN_DEPRECATED_PURGE
message.locale: This purge job is deprecated. Please use curam.citizenworkspace.facade.intf.CitizenWorkspacePurgeOldDataProcess.process for purging the old data.

message.name: WARN_DEPRECATED_PURGE_OFFLINE
message.locale: This purge job is deprecated. Please use curam.citizenworkspace.facade.intf.CitizenWorkspacePurgeDataProcess for purging the transient data.

message.name: ERR_SYNC_TOKEN_MISSING_OR_INVALID
message.locale: An error has occurred. This may have been caused by your session expiring or by multiple tabs being opened. Please click the home link to start over.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_TYPE_REFERENCE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No Program Type with a Reference of %1s could be found.

message.name: ERR_INTAKE_APPLICATION_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: The Program Type does not have an associated Intake Application Type.

message.name: ERR_MISSING_MOTIVATION_RESULTS_PARTICIPANT_ICON
message.locale: The system configuration is missing a definition in the App Resource properties file 'MotivationResultsPersonStatusIconMapping' for the following icon property key: %1s.

message.name: ERR_SESSION_TOKEN_EXPIRED
message.locale: The token that you are attempting to use has expired. Please navigate to the home page and start again.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SCRIPT_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An IEG Script for Online Appeals has not been defined

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_SCHEMA_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: A Datastore Schema for Online Appeals has not been defined.

message.name: ERR_CUSTOM_EAS_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Custom External Access Security class not found: %1s.

message.name: ERR_CUSTOM_EAS_CONFIGURATION_ERROR
message.locale: External Access Security is not configured correctly: %1s.

message.name: INF_PARAM_VALUE_INCORRECT
message.locale: CodeTable values for CitizenScript Status ('%1s') and CitizenScript Type ('%2s') are incorrect

message.name: INF_PARAM_STATUS_VALUE_INCORRECT
message.locale: CodeTable values for CitizenScript Status ('%1s') is incorrect

message.name: INF_PARAM_SCRIPT_VALUE_INCORRECT
message.locale: CodeTable values for CitizenScript Type ('%1s') is incorrect

message.name: INF_PURGE_DATE_INCORRECT
message.locale: Purge Date should not be empty.
